title: Technical Product Manager
description: As a Technical Product Manager, you will bridge the gap between business requirements and technical execution. You will define the product vision, create detailed roadmaps, and work closely with engineering teams to deliver impactful features. Your responsibilities include gathering and prioritizing requirements, writing technical specifications, and managing the product lifecycle from concept to launch. You should have a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and the ability to make data-informed decisions. Experience with Agile methodologies and a deep understanding of the software development process are crucial for success in this role.
